title: How to get an education assessment of a degree from Sikkim Manipal University Distance Education for Canada PR - Quora

response.answer_text: Though, there are 3–4 Agencies for Education Qualification Evaluation, most preferable is WES. Your Assessment will be done by them on the merits of the qualifications and verasity of the Institution etc., and WES provides its equivalency in comparision to the International standards.
Contact SMU, and ask them to send your transcripts after completing the formalities there.
